Posts.EditableText:
I want to delete my account, as is my right under the GDPR. I cannot find any way to contact support. Twitter and facebook are dead. the support page gives an error and there is no other way to contact. No email, no phone number. I can't even change my own email adress.

Please delete my account. and maybe fix this mess.

regards,
M808V
